name: Mine Escape - Made for Ludum Dare 37
name_original: Mine Escape - Made for Ludum Dare 37
description:
///// DESCRIPTION /////

You and six biological experiments, gone wrong, are trapped inside a secret government underground testing facility. You have to escape, but the door to freedom is locked behind a six digit keypad. You have to find all the code pieces and escape before it's too late for you!

///// OBJECTIVE /////

There are six chests you have to unlock that are scattered across the maze-like map. There are six enemies you have to kill to gain keys to unlock these chests. Enemies can be killed through throwing knives at them. Once you have unlocked all the chests and gained all six pieces of the code, you then have to find the door and keypad. You enter the code into the keypad, and go through the door to victory!

///// HOW TO PLAY /////

W A S D - Move

Mouse - Controls Camera

Left Mouse Button - Interact with objects (pick up items, open chests, etc.)

Right Mouse Button - Throw knives at enemies

Escape - Open pause menu

///// MISC /////

Please report any serious bugs.

Ludum dare Link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=125333
